meanings.definition: The action of renovating a building or room.
meanings.sent1: The renovations on the old house made it look brand new.
meanings.sent2: The renovations on the school included painting the walls and fixing the roof.
meanings.sent3: The renovations turned the boring office into a vibrant workspace.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like the renovations that transformed the gloomy room into a cheerful space.
meanings.sent5: The renovations brought life back to the neglected building.

meanings.definition: The process of improving or repairing something.
meanings.sent1: After the renovations, the playground became a fun place for kids to play.
meanings.sent2: The renovations on the car made it run smoothly again.
meanings.sent3: The renovations to the recipe turned a bland dish into a flavorful meal.
meanings.sent4: His positive attitude was like the renovations that uplifted the team spirit.
meanings.sent5: The renovations to the garden made it a peaceful retreat.
